channel.title: Repair on The IMSAI Gang
channel.description: Recent content in Repair on The IMSAI Gang

item.title: Front Panel Broke Down: A Dead 74LS10
item.description: Front panel repair During the process of testing the memory dumper card, we found some how the front panel is behaving weirdly. Took quite a while for us to track down the problem, but eventually it narrowed down to a broken 74LS10 (Dual Tri-input NAND gates). Which controls the input switches.
